newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's Somague stock hits new high.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's Somague stock hits new high.

text.p: Shares in construction company Somague-SGPS hit a new high for the year of 1,220 escudos on Friday and could target 1,300 escudos in the short term on optimism over the company's profit outlook, traders said.
The share has been gaining strongly since Somague posted higher profits for the first half of the year earlier this week.
"Somague is reflecting the good prospects for the (construction) sector. The next (price) objective is 1,300, possibly even next week," said one trader.
Somague boosted its first half profit to 467 million escudos ($3.1 million) against 129 million in the same period last year. Turnover nearly doubled to 22.1 billion escudos.
The company has forecast a full-year profit of around one billion escudos.
